name: Howly
description:
You invented a little wormhole, but you can't control its growth. Suddenly, he swallowed you and teleported to another dimension, but the wormhole becomes small again. You're stuck there but you know there is a solution. Feed your little wormhole named Howly to almost anything to re-grow and teleport to another dimension. But be careful, there are some monsters and they don't like either of you. Survive, collect items and feed Howly. Be sure to protect Howly from monsters because he hates them.
